description: These happy kaomoji emoticons have triangles for mouths. These triangles gives these happy emotes giant smiles, as if they couldn’t get their mouths to open any wider! These are emoticons lost to absolute joy and bliss folks, and its all thanks to that wonderful triangle mouth. There is no beating it. There is a huge selection of possibility here, so I can guarantee you will find the perfect one for your self expression.
